page.title: 01GENERAL REPORT (LOTHIAN R.)
page.content: MOST OF OUR AREA IS{FARMLAND}AND IS USED FOR{GRAZING}THE CATTLE ESPECIALLY UP IN THE HILLS WHERE SHEEP,COWS,AND HORSES GRAZE,AND GROWING CROPS SUCH AS GRASS,HAY,AND BARLEY GROW. THERE ARE TWO HOSPITALS IN OUR AREA WHICH {SERVE W.LOTHIAN},1 IS A { {GENERAL}HOSPITAL WITH AN ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY UNIT.THERE IS A VILLAGE HOSPITAL DEALING WITH {PSYCHIATRIC} PATIENTS.A NEW HOSPITAL IS BEING BUILT IN LIVINGSTON TO REPLACE{BANGOUR {GENERAL HOSPITAL. LIVINGSTON IS ONE OF THE FIVE NEW TOWNS WHICH HAVE BEEN BUILT IN SCOTLAND.LIVINGSTON WAS BUILT TO HOUSE THE OVERSPILL IN GLASGOW.THEY BUILT IT HERE BECAUSE IT HAD GOOD{ {COMMUNICATIONS}LINKS.THE POPULATION IS 39550 AND STILL GROWING.THERE IS ALSO A SMALL VILLAGE IN OUR AREA CALLED DECHMONT VILLAGE .
